Forms

You can download the following forms comes under the rule of Odisha Rights to Public Service Act, 2012.

Sl No. Form Name Download
1 Form of Acknowledgement
2 Form of Notice Board
3 Form of Register to be maintained with Designated Officer
4 Form of Register to be maintained with Appellate Authority
5 Form of Register to be maintained with Revisional Authority
